ChunkText: you do not have to take any action while entering the US concerning this form, your I-94 record indicates the kind of status you have in the us, and how long you can remain in the us.
ContextBefore: officers may choose to inspect your luggage, but often will only ask a few questions from your declarations form and allow you to exit the airport. I-94 entry record once you successfully enter the us, you will have an electronic record of your entry recorded in the department of homeland securitys database.
ContextAfter: if you need any emergency assistance upon your arrival at umbc, please contact the umbc police at 410-455-5555. tips for smooth travel you can take steps to make sure your entry to the US is as smooth an experience as possible.
